snippet.title: Ooblets Early Access trailer | PC Gaming Show 2020
snippet.description:
Revealed at the PC Gaming Show 2020, Ooblets' Early Access launch is nearly here! It arrives on the Epic Games Store this summer.

If you wondered what's up with the trippy mushrooms in this trailer, you're not alone. Read more here: www.pcgamer.com/ooblets-early-access-pc-gaming-show-2020

www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
